Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Els Encantats Hotel Spa in Espot, you'll be within the vicinity of Parc Nacional d'Aiguestortes. This hotel is within the region of Baqueira Beret Ski Resort.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 14 guestrooms featuring minibars.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Els Encantats Hotel Spa.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Els Encantats Hotel Spa.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 14 guestrooms featuring minibars.

When you stay at Els Encantats Hotel Spa in Espot, you'll be within the vicinity of Parc Nacional d'Aiguestortes. This hotel is within the region of Baqueira Beret Ski Resort.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Parc Nacional d'Aiguestortes - 6.7 km / 4.1 mi
Baqueira Beret Ski Resort - 19.4 km / 12.1 mi
Port Aine Ski Resort - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi
Boi Taull Ski Resort - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi
Valle de Aran Museum - 26.7 km / 16.6 mi
Vielha Ice Palace - 27.3 km / 17 mi
Congost de Collegats - 31.4 km / 19.5 mi
Torre Solsona - 37.9 km / 23.6 mi
La Seu d'Urgell Cathedral - 39 km / 24.2 mi
Iglesia de Sant Esteve - 57.4 km / 35.7 mi
Placa de Cerdanya - 57.4 km / 35.7 mi
Port del Comte Ski Resort - 59.8 km / 37.2 mi
Woodland Museum - 60.6 km / 37.7 mi
Congost de Montrebei - 64.6 km / 40.1 mi
La Masella Ski Resort - 71.2 km / 44.2 mi

The preferred airport for Els Encantats Hotel Spa is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 163.4 km / 101.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
